name: Instytut Komunikacji Międzykulturowej i Studiów Interdyscyplinarnych SILK ROAD / The Institute for Intercultural Communication and Interdisciplinary Studies SILK ROAD
goal: The actions of the Institute connected with intercultural communication and dialogue, exchange of goods and culture among different countries and communities, are based on the concept of ancient Silk Road.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Transparency of lobbing in the EU.
The discussion on the European Values and EU Citizenship.
Access to public information in the EU https://advocate-europe.eu/ideas/europe-from-transparency-to-accountability/
